pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Geo skyA Python package to get all city, stae and country names## UsageFollowing methods can be utilized to get info..```from geosky import geo_pluggeo_plug.all_CountryNames()geo_plug.all_Country_StateNames()geo_plug.all_State_CityNames(name)# name == 'all' or stae namegeo_plug.all_State_CityNames('Odisha')```To uninstall execute following..```pip uninstall geosky```
